title: Fragments, 4th–5th century
medium:

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, 4th–5th century.
4th–5th century. Medium: Warp; Z-spun linen. Wefts; Z-spun lunen, S-spun wools.
Technique: slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrapping. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-117-a,b.
